mapper.select: SELECT id,divisionId,positionId,employeeId FROM hr_division_position WHERE employeeId LIKE '%${id}%'

SELECT
FROM hr_division_position WHERE divisionId = #{divisionId} AND positionId = #{positionId} AND employeeId LIKE '%${employeeId}%'
select count(*) from hr_division_position where divisionId = #{divisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND positionId = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT employeeId FROM hr_division_position WHERE divisionId = #{id} AND positionId = "1"
mapper.delete: delete from hr_division_position where divisionId = #{divisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND positionId = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND employeeId = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hr_division_position (id, diviId, posiId,employId) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into hr_division_position
id,
divisionId,
positionId,
employeeId,
